Articles.Content: Hey gang! I haven't been on KSP for very long but, it already seems like the type of program that would be great to have multiplayer sessions on. Are there any servers that people can connect to and work on projects together? If not, is this being considered or developed?
Official multiplayer mode is under development. Meanwhile you have to look into mods. Dark Multiplayer mod seems to be the standard at the moment.

> 
> Official multiplayer mode is under development. Meanwhile you have to look into mods. Dark Multiplayer mod seems to be the standard at the moment.

Sounds good. There's something in place and more to come. All I need to know. Thanks, Monophonic!

You should be warned that DMP is really only for those that are curious and want to toy around a bit. It is still very buggy, but it will likely show a general sense of what to expect when the official one launches as it is likely to use a very similar warp instancing system.
How exactly does it handle time warps?

You can also do a ["turn based" style multiplayer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112384-%28Turn-based%29-Kerbal-Multiplayer-Collaboration) by passing a save file among a group. The forum is a great place to find or start something like that.
